column9: The job allows me to make my own decisions about how to schedule my work.
column10: The job allows me to decide on the order in which things are done.
column11: The job allows me to plan how I do my work.
column12: The job gives me a chance to use my personal initiative or judgment in carrying out the work.
column13: The job allows me to make a lot of decisions on my own.
column14: The job provides me with significant autonomy in making decisions.
column15: The job allows me to make decisions about what methods I use to complete my work.
column16: The job gives me considerable opportunity for independence and freedom in how I do the work.
column17: The job allows me to decide on my own how to go about doing my work.

column19: The job involves doing a number of different things.
column20: The job requires the performance of a wide range of tasks.
column21: The job involves performing a variety of tasks.
column22: The results of my work are likely to significantly affect the lives of other people.
column23: The job itself is very significant and important in the broader scheme of things.
column24: The job has a large impact on people outside the organization.
column25: The work performed on the job has a significant impact on people outside the organization.
column26: The job involves completing a piece of work that has an obvious beginning and end.

column29: The job allows me to complete work I start.

column36: The job involves performing relatively simple tasks.

column41: The job involves solving problems that have no obvious correct answer.
column42: The job requires me to be creative.
column43: The job often involves dealing with problems that I have not met before.
column44: The job requires unique ideas or solutions to problems.
column45: The job requires a variety of skills.
column46: The job requires me to utilize a variety of different skills in order to complete the work.
column47: The job requires me to use a number of complex or high-level skills.
column48: The job requires the use of a number of skills.
column49: The job is highly specialized in terms of purpose, tasks, or activities.
column50: The tools, procedures, materials, and so forth used in this job are highly specialized in terms of purpose.
column51: The job requires very specialized knowledge and skills.

column66: The job involves interaction with people who are not members of my organization.
